original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 319/323 against the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were down and the rupee closed at 319/323 against the US dollar in the spot market on Tuesday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond closed at 25.40/26.40 percent on Tuesday, down from 28.60/80 percent on Monday.
A 15.09.2027 bond closed at 25.35/50 percent, down from 26.50/60 percent on Monday.
Sri Lanka rupee closed at 319/323 rupees against the US dollar, from 321/324 rupees from a day earlier. (Colombo/ April 04/2023)
